label: 源時綱
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (dates unknown, active eleventh century). Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (5), Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集(2), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (5), and Wakan kensakushū (3). [漢詩、和漢兼作集]
